alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:03AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Itasca and Koochiching Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1102 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manitou, to near Squaw Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Inger around 1110 AM CDT. Loman around 1120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Marcell, Pelland and International Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for north central Minnesota.
